channel.title: Resources on CityU-Bioinformatics
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on CityU-Bioinformatics

item.title: Online Courses
item.description: Table of Contents Online Courses edx online courses R Programming courses: Data Science related courses: Mechine Learning courses: Coursera online courses R Programming courses: Data Science related courses: Mechine Learning courses: Online Courses There are many great online learning platforms that provide various elementary and advanced courses of R/Data science/R-packages. Most of those courses is free, but you can also choose some charged courses for specific needs or pay for a verified certificate of the courses.

item.title: Other Resources
item.description: Table of Contents Bioconductor Recommended books Blogs/website International Society for Computational Biology (ISCB) Careers: How can I become a bioinformatics practitioner? There are many great open sources website which contains tutorials, softwares, tools of bioinformatics field to help you get a great understanding of it and make effectively use of related softwares/tools. Bioconductor Bioconductor is an open source, open development software project to provide tools for the analysis and comprehension of high-throughput genomic data.
